```py
>>> arrays = [['falcon', 'parrot', 'cockatoo', 'kiwi',
...            'lion', 'monkey', 'rabbit'],
...           ['bird', 'bird', 'bird', 'bird',
...            'mammal', 'mammal', 'mammal']]
>>> index = pd.MultiIndex.from_arrays(arrays, names=('name', 'class'))
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({'max_speed': [389.0, 24.0, 70.0, np.nan,
...                                  80.5, 21.5, 15.0]},
...                   index=index)
>>> df
 max_speed
name     class
falcon   bird        389.0
parrot   bird         24.0
cockatoo bird         70.0
kiwi     bird          NaN
lion     mammal       80.5
monkey   mammal       21.5
rabbit   mammal       15.0
>>> gb = df.groupby(["class"])
>>> gb.skew()
 max_speed
class
bird     1.628296
mammal   1.669046
>>> gb.skew(skipna=False)
 max_speed
class
bird          NaN
mammal   1.669046 
```
